content:
Dragonfire shells replace their main explosive charge with
an air-reactive concentrate. When the round detonates, the
payload combusts in a burst of fire, offering area saturation
comparable to a flamer.
extraSubCategories:
Decrease the weapon's Damage by 2. Anyone
within 2 metres of, and including, the target must succeed on
an Agility Test or catch on fire. The firer may choose to target
an object or specific area instead of an opponent. In this case
the shot is Routine (+20), and everyone in the 2 metre radius
must Test to avoid catching fire.
